title: Grand Opening: Five Star Waterfront Stay in Montenegro
description: Be among the first to experience this five-star hideout perched on the cobalt waters of the charming Lustica Bay. This anticipated addition to the Montenegro coastline brings high-end sustainable accommodation to the up-and-coming Marina Village hub of the bay, with its European-style waterfront and elegant ambience. Experience three nights in ultimate luxury at The Chedi Lustica Bay with daily buffet breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival and a EUR20 spa credit per room.
